backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing the purpose of each frontend source file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining OKLCH color variables, themes, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that centers and renders the ReactionGameScreen.
frontend/src/game/assets.ts: Centralized image paths for Image A and Image B.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Holds configurable timing constants for game delays, overlays, and penalties.
frontend/src/game/pixelStyles.ts: Shared minimalist winter glass UI class presets for consistent styling.
frontend/src/game/ReactionGameScreen.tsx: Main game controller UI handling gameplay flow, result display, and share preview routing.
frontend/src/game/ResultScreen.tsx: Displays the player's reaction time with buttons to replay or open the share preview.
frontend/src/game/share.ts: Implements share logic using Web Share API with clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/game/SharePreviewScreen.tsx: Shows Image B with 'Booo!!!' overlay and reaction message plus share and close actions.
frontend/src/game/useReactionGame.ts: Custom hook managing reaction-game state transitions, random delay timing, premature tap penalties, and reaction-time calculation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, stored-identity initialization, and status management.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with a winter color palette, pixel font, and background image scrim.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors from CSS variables, adding pixel fonts, shadows, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the reaction game, design direction, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features.
